task: Filter cells with very low total UMI counts. Return a JSON object with field: cells_after_filtering (number remaining after filter).
notes: tolerance is tight because this dataset looks clean and the paper uses very low QC cutoffs (<10 UMIs), so only a small number of near-empty cells should be removed. In a local test, the agent used an overly high cutoff (100 UMIs) without checking the UMI distribution and filtered ~40% of cells.
